original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā vesāliyam viharati mahā vane kūṭāgāra sālāya

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattāḥ bhikkhū vaggumudāya nadiyāḥ tīre vassam upagacchisu

original: Tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetu

original: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—“etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā
analyzed: atha kho tesam bhikkhūnam etat ahosi etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā dvīhitikā seta ṭṭhikā

original: salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ. Kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena samaggā
analyzed: salākā vuttā na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetu kena nu khalu mayam upāyena samaggā

original: sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vaseyyāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilameyyāmā”ti?
analyzed: sammodamānāḥ a vivadamānā phāsukam vassam vaseyyāma na ca piṇḍakena kilameyyāma ati

original: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhema. Evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti.
analyzed: ekacce evam āha suhanda mayaḥ āvuso gihīnam kammantam adhiṭṭhema evam te amhākam dātum maññissanti

original: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: evam mayam samaggā sammodamānā a vivadamānā phāsukam vassam vasissāma na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāma ati

original: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“alaṁ, āvuso, kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena?
analyzed: ekacce evam āha suale āvuso kim gihīnam kammantam adhiṭṭhitena

original: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ harāma. Evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti.
analyzed: handa mayaḥ āvusaḥ gihīnam dūteyyam harāmaḥ evam te amhākam dātum maññissanti

original: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: evam mayam samaggā sammodamānā a vivadamānā phāsukam vassam vasissāma na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāma ati

original: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“alaṁ, āvuso; kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena. Kiṁ gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ haṭena.
analyzed: ekacce evam āha suale āvuso kim gihīnam kammantam adhiṭṭhitena kim gihīnam dūteyyam haṭena

original: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissāma—
analyzed: handa mayaḥ āvuso gihīnam aññamaññassa uttari manussa dhammassa vaṇṇam bhāsissāma

original: ‘asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu dutiyassa jhānassa lābhī,
analyzed: asukaḥ bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī asukaḥ bhikkhu dutiyassa jhānassa lābhī

original: asuko bhikkhu tatiyassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu catutthassa jhānassa lābhī,
analyzed: asukaḥ bhikkhu tatiyassa jhānassa lābhī asukaḥ bhikkhu catutthassa jhānassa lābhī

original: asuko bhikkhu sotāpanno, asuko bhikkhu sakadāgāmī, asuko bhikkhu anāgāmī, asuko bhikkhu
analyzed: asukaḥ bhikkhu sotāpannaḥ asukaḥ bhikkhu sakadāgāmī asukaḥ bhikkhu anāgāmī asukaḥ bhikkhu

original: arahā, asuko bhikkhu tevijjo, asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño’ti.
analyzed: arahā asukaḥ bhikkhu tevijjaḥ asukaḥ bhikkhu chaḍabhiñño ti

original: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: evam mayam samaggā sammodamānā a vivadamānā phāsukam vassam vasissāma na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāma ati

original: “Eso yeva kho, āvuso, seyyo, yo amhākaṁ gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito”ti.
analyzed: esaḥ yā iva kho āvuso seyyaḥ yaḥ amhākam gihīnam aññamaññassa uttari manussa dhammassa vaṇṇaḥ bhāsito ti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu—
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū gihīnam aññamaññassa uttari manussa dhammassa vaṇṇam bhāsisu

original: “asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī …pe… asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño”ti.
analyzed: asukaḥ bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī pe asukaḥ bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño ti

original: Atha kho te manussā—“lābhā vata no, suladdhaṁ vata no, yesaṁ no evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ
analyzed: atha kho te manussa alābhāḥ vata no su laddham vata no yesam no evarūpāḥ bhikkhū

original: upagatā, na vata no ito pubbe evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā, yathayime bhikkhū sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti.
analyzed: upagatāḥ na vata no itas pubbe evarūpāḥ bhikkhū vassam upagatāḥ yathā ime bhikkhū sīlavantaḥ kalyāṇa dhammā ti

original: Te na tādisāni bhojanāni attanā bhuñjanti, mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti.
analyzed: te na tādisāni bhojanāni attanā bhuñjanti mātā pitūnam denti putta dārassa denti dāsa kammakara porisassa denti mitta amaccānam denti ñāti sālohitānam denti yādisāni bhikkhūnam denti

original: Na tādisāni khādanīyāni sāyanīyāni pānāni attanā khādanti sāyanti pivanti mātāpitūnaṁ
analyzed: na tādisāni khādanīyāni sāyanīyāni pānāni attanā khādanti sāyanti pivanti mātā pitūna

original: denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ
analyzed: denti putta dārassa denti dāsa kammakara porisassa denti mitta amaccānam denti ñāti sālohitānam

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū vaṇṇavā ahesuṁ pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū vaṇṇavā ahesum pīṇi indriyā pasanna mukha vaṇṇā vippasanna chavi vaṇṇā

original: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
analyzed: āciṇṇam kho pana etam vassa vuṭṭhānam bhikkhūnam bhagavantam dassanāya upasaṅkamitu

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vesālī tena pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū vassa vuṭṭhāḥ temāsa cayena senāsanam sasāmetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena vesālī tena pakkamisu

original: Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: anupubbena yena vesālī mahā vanam kūṭāgāra sālā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: Tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhū kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassa vuṭṭhāḥ bhikkhū kisāḥ honti lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattāḥ

original: Vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
analyzed: pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pīṇi indriyā pasanna mukha vaṇṇā vippasanna chavi vaṇṇā

original: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
analyzed: āciṇṇam kho pana etam buddhānam bhagavantānam āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhim paṭisammoditu

original: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etat avoca

original: kacci samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
analyzed: kacci samaggā sammodamānā a vivadamānā phāsukam vassam vasittha na ca piṇḍakena kilamittha ati

original: Samaggā ca mayaṁ, bhante, sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasimhā, na ca piṇḍakena kilamimhā”ti.
analyzed: samaggā ca maya bhante sammodamānā a vivadamānā phāsukam vassam vasimha na ca piṇḍakena kilamimha ati

original: Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti.
analyzed: jānantā api tathāgatā pucchanti jānantā api na pucchanti

original: Kālaṁ viditvā pucchanti, kālaṁ viditvā na pucchanti.
analyzed: kālam viditvā pucchanti kālam viditvā na pucchanti
attha sañhitam tathāgatāḥ pucchanti no anattha sañhita

original: Dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti—“dhammaṁ vā desessāma, sāvakānaṁ vā sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmā”ti.
analyzed: dvīhākārehi buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ bhikkhū paṭipucchanti dhammam vā desessāma sāvakānam vā sikkhāpadam paññapessāma ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—“yathā kathaṁ pana tumhe, bhikkhave, samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etat avoca yathā katham pana tumhe bhikkhave samaggāḥ sammodamānāḥ a vivadamānāḥ phāsukam vassam vasittha na ca piṇḍakena kilamittha ati

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, bhikkhave, udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe bhikkhave udarassa kāraṇā gihīnam aññamaññassa uttari manussa dhammassa vaṇṇam bhāsissatha
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṁ āroceyya bhūtasmiṁ, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu an upasampannassa uttari manussa dhammaṃ āroceyya bhūtasmi pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā, avaseso anupasampanno nāma.
analyzed: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā avasesaḥ anupasampannaḥ nāma

original: jhānaṁ, vimokkho, samādhi, samāpatti, ñāṇadassanaṁ, maggabhāvanā, phalasacchikiriyā, kilesappahānaṁ, vinīvaraṇatā cittassa, suññāgāre abhirati.
analyzed: samādhi samāpatti ñāṇa dassana magga bhāvanā phala sacchikiriyā kilesa ppahāna vinīvaraṇa tā cittassa suññāgāre abhirati

original: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: paṭhamam jhāna dutiyam jhāna tatiyam jhāna catuttham jhāna

original: suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho.
analyzed: suññataḥ vimokkhaḥ animittaḥ vimokkhaḥ appaṇihitaḥ vimokkhaḥ

original: suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi.
analyzed: suññataḥ samādhi animitto samādhi appaṇihitaḥ samādhi

original: suññatā samāpatti, animittā samāpatti, appaṇihitā samāpatti.
analyzed: suñña tā samāpatti animittā samāpatti appaṇihitā samāpatti

original: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
analyzed: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañca indriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgāḥ ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: sotāpattiphalassa sacchikiriyā, sakadāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, anāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, arahattassa sacchikiriyā.
analyzed: sotāpatti phalassa sacchikiriyā sakadāgāmi phalassa sacchikiriyā anāgāmi phalassa sacchikiriyā arahattassa sacchikiriyā

original: rāgassa pahānaṁ, dosassa pahānaṁ, mohassa pahānaṁ.
analyzed: rāgassa pahāna dosassa pahāna mohassa pahāna

original: rāgā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, dosā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, mohā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā.
analyzed: cittam vinīvaraṇa tā dosā cittam vinīvaraṇa tā mohā cittam vinīvaraṇa tā

original: paṭhamena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, dutiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, tatiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, catutthena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati.
analyzed: paṭhamena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati dutiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati tatiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati catutthena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati

original: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjin”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa paṭhamam jhānam samāpajjinti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjāmī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa paṭhamam jhānam samāpajjāmi iti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpanno”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa paṭhamam jhānam samāpannaḥ ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhimhi iti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa vasimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa paṭhamassa jhānassa vasimhi iti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa paṭhamam jhānam sacchikatam mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; catutthassa jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ catutthassa jhānassa lābhimhi vasimhi catuttham jhānam sacchikatam mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: appaṇihitaṁ samādhiṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; appaṇihitassa samādhissa lābhimhi, vasimhi; appaṇihito samādhi sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: appaṇihitam samādhim samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ appaṇihitassa samādhissa lābhimhi vasimhi appaṇihitaḥ samādhi sacchikataḥ mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: appaṇihitaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; appaṇihitāya samāpattiyā lābhimhi, vasimhi; appaṇihitā samāpatti sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: appaṇihitam samāpattim samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ appaṇihitāya samāpattiyāḥ lābhimhi vasimhi appaṇihitā samāpatti sacchikatā mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa— “tisso vijjā samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; tissannaṁ vijjānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; tisso vijjā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa tissaḥ vijjā samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ tissannam vijjānam lābhimhi vasimhi tissaḥ vijjā sacchikatā mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: cattāro iddhipāde samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; catunnaṁ iddhipādānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; cattāro iddhipādā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: cattāraḥ iddhipāde samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ catunnam iddhipādānam lābhimhi vasimhi cattāro iddhipādā sacchikatāḥ mayā iti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: pañca balāni samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; pañcannaṁ balānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; pañca balāni sacchikatāni mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: pañca balāni samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ pañcannam balānam lābhimhi vasimhi pañca balāni sacchikatāni mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa— “satta bojjhaṅge samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; satta bojjhaṅgā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: anupasampannassa satta bojjhaṅge samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ sattannam bojjhaṅgānam lābhimhi vasimhi satta bojjhaṅgā sacchikatā mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa

original: anupasampannassa— “ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno;
analyzed: an upasampannassa ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ

original: ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sacchikato
analyzed: ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa lābhimhi vasimhi ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo sacchikataḥ

original: arahattaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; arahattassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: arahattam samāpajji samāpajjāmi samāpannaḥ arahattassa lābhimhi vasimhi arahattam sacchikatam mayā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa
an upasampannassa rāgaḥ me catto pe

analyzed: appaṇihitam samāpattim samāpajji samāpajjati samāpannaḥ appaṇihitāya samāpattiyā lābhī vasī tena bhikkhunā appaṇihitā samāpatti sacchikatā ati bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: anupasampannassa— “yo te vihāre vasi so bhikkhu tisso vijjā …pe…

original: moho catto, vanto, mutto, pahīno, paṭinissaṭṭho, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito;
analyzed: mohaḥ cattaḥ vantaḥ mutto pahīnaḥ paṭinissaṭṭhaḥ ukkheṭitaḥ samukkheṭitaḥ

original: mohā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.

original: dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji,
analyzed: dutiyam jhānam tatiyam jhānam catuttham jhānam samāpajji

original: samāpanno; so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, vasī; tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: samāpannaḥ so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī vasī tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catuttham jhānam sacchikatanti bhaṇantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa

analyzed: jhānam samāpajji samāpajjati samāpanno so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa
